Paragraph: To investigate effects of aconitine on myocardial injury , we performed cytotoxicity assay in neonatal rat ventricular myocytes ( NRVMs ) , as well as measured lactate dehydrogenase level in the culture medium of NRVMs and activities of serum cardiac enzymes in rats .

| Chemical |
| --- |
| aconitine |
| lactate dehydrogenase |

In the given paragraph, "aconitine" is the only chemical entity mentioned. The other entities mentioned, "cytotoxicity assay," "neonatal rat ventricular myocytes (NRVMs)," "culture medium," and "serum cardiac enzymes," are not chemicals but rather experimental methods, cell types, and biological substances.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |

| aconitine |

In the given paragraph, only "aconitine" is a chemical entity. The other entities mentioned, "cytotoxicity assay," "neonatal rat ventricular myocytes (NRVMs)," "culture medium," and "serum cardiac enzymes," do not clearly refer to chemicals. "Cytotoxicity assay" is a method used to measure the toxicity of a substance, "neonatal rat ventricular myocytes (NRVMs)" are a type of cell, "culture medium" is a liquid medium used to grow cells, and "serum cardiac enzymes" are proteins released from damaged heart tissue.
